order_cancellation.title: Order Cancellation Policy
order_cancellation.description_banner: Configure order cancellation policies to control when customers can cancel orders and whether a penalty is required.
order_cancellation.matching_rules_desc: All enabled policies are matched sequentially by sort order. The system automatically selects the most appropriate policy based on the order time (higher penalty or no cancellation).
order_cancellation.no_policies: No cancellation policies yet. Click the 'Add Policy' button to create one.
order_cancellation.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this cancellation policy?

form.name: Policy Name
form.cancellable_hours_placeholder: Leave blank to allow cancellation at any time
form.cancellable_hours_help: How many hours after order creation can it be cancelled
form.cancellable_hours_negative: Limit time must be greater than or equal to 0
form.penalty_percentage_help: Percentage of penalty charged when cancelling an order (up to one decimal place)
form.penalty_required: Penalty percentage must be set for policies with penalty
form.enabled_help: Only enabled policies will participate in tiered matching
